formalText: She guesses there's been a lot of stress and she's worried.
So on Friday, her brother calls her and she doesn't know, he's not doing well.
She doesn't know so it just made her extremely worried about him.
She's so worried about something that she doesn't know to deal with. She goes back and forth between trying not to think about it and being worried, but we'll see.
She just doesn't want to deal with it.
She needs to worry about other things.
